error-page.title: Sorry! Something went wrong...
error-page.message: We have been notified about the issue and are working on fixing it.

replace-participant.title: Replace attendee
replace-participant.description: This action will replace the original attendee with the new attendee details entered below. Course instructions will be sent to the relevant details provided and the order will be updated accordingly.
replace-participant.alert-message: Important: Please ensure the email address is entered correctly and is for the participant attending the course.
replace-participant.replacement-error: There was an error replacing the participant.
replace-participant.replacement-error-INVALID_EMAIL: Invite email is already registered on the course.
replace-participant.terms-notice: I confirm that the billing details remain the same for this booking in line with Team Teach Terms of Business.

not-found.title: Page not found
not-found.info: Either you followed an invalid link or you do not have access to view this page. Please use the main navigation to find your way.

venue-selector.title: Venue
venue-selector.placeholder: Start typing venue name or address
venue-selector.min-chars-label: Please type at least 3 characters for suggestions.
venue-selector.google-maps-api-error: Unknown error while communicating with Google Maps API.

modal.title: Confirm venue details
modal.description: Before you add this venue, please confirm the location details below.

create-course-menu.tooltip-text: You don't have the proper certificate for course creation

course-form.blended-learning-price-label: If not already pre-purchased by the chosen organisation, each additional license will result in a £25 (plus VAT) fee per person attending this course.
course-form.min-start-date: Start date should not be earlier that 1st October 2023
course-form.min-end-date: End date should not be earlier that 1st October 2023
course-form.start-date-format: Start date must be a valid date
course-form.end-date-format: End date must be a valid date
course-form.attendees-edit-label: Trainer and attendee ratio can only be edited in accordance with Team Teach training protocols.
course-form.attendees-description: Assist trainer(s) may be required based on the number of attendees.
course-form.end-date-before-start-date: End date must be after the start date
course-form.min-participants-positive: Minimum number of attendees must be a positive number
course-form.min-participants-required: Minimum number of attendees is required field
course-form.min-participants-less-than: Minimum number of attendees must be less than the maximum number of attendees
course-form.max-participants-required: Maximum number of attendees is required field
course-form.max-participants-positive: Maximum number of attendees must be a positive number
course-form.attendees-number-exceeds-trainer-ratio-m: Number of attendees exceeds current trainer ratio
course-form.online-meeting-link-required: Online meeting link is a required field
course-form.contact-person-error: Contact name is a required field
course-form.aol-label: Is this course being delivered under a Team Teach Area Operating Licence?
course-form.course-cost: How much are you charging for this course?
course-form.course-cost-positive-number-error: Course cost must be a positive number
course-form.course-cost-required-error: Provide the price of the course
course-form.course-cost-disclaimer: Team Teach is not responsible for collecting fees for this course
course-form.free-spaces-description: This will add free spaces onto the order and invoice for the given organisation selected
course-form.free-spaces-required: Free spaces is a required field
course-form.free-spaces-less-equal: Free spaces must be less or equal to the maximum number of attendees
course-form.sales-rep-error: Sales representative is a required field
course-form.source-label: How did you hear about us?
course-form.price-number-error: Price per attendee must be a positive number
course-form.price-required-error: Price per attendee is a required field
course-form.course-level-one-info: Please be aware some holds may fall under Level Two certification.
course-form.aol-info: Please be aware that any training delivered outside of a licenced area would be invalidated by Team Teach and may cause the licence to be removed.
course-form.select-one-option: Please mark at least one of the options above
course-form.bild-strategies-required: At least one BILD strategy should be selected

special-instructions.title: Special Instructions
special-instructions.subtitle: Please ensure you include all applicable course information i.e. twilight dates, online training links, and any other relevant details.
special-instructions.modal-message: You are going to reset the existing instructions to the default value. Do you want to proceed?

ADVANCED_TRAINER.default:
ID Check

Please bring a valid form of ID with you to the training course, this must consist of either a valid passport or driving licence.

Certification Requirements

  • A valid Team Teach Intermediate Trainer Certificate
  • The equivalent of a One Day Emergency at Work First Aid Certificate

ID Check

Please bring a valid form of ID with you to the training course, this must consist of either a valid passport or driving licence.

Certification Requirements

  • The equivalent of a One Day Emergency at Work First Aid Certificate

modal_ACCEPT.title: Ready to build the course?

modal_ACCEPT.msg-ASSISTANT: Upon accepting this invitation, you can see a full overview of the course.
modal_ACCEPT.msg-MODERATOR: Upon accepting this invitation, you can see a full overview of the course.

modal_DECLINE.title: Are you sure you want to decline this course?
modal_DECLINE.msg: You will no longer have access to this course once you have declined.

validation.end-date-before-start-date: The date is before the start date
validation.start-date-after-end-date: The date is after the end date

profile-archive-dialog.title: Archive profile
profile-archive-dialog.confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to archive user {{firstName}} {{lastName}} with the email {{email}}? Archiving a user will remove them from view from within Connect and make them unable to log in to their account. The archived user will not be visible to organisation admins and all non-admin Team Teach employees. This action can not be undone.
profile-archive-dialog.trainer-for-courses: This user is a trainer for course(s):
profile-archive-dialog.trainer-for-courses-action: To archive this user, they cannot be assigned as a trainer for any course that hasn’t been completed or cancelled.
profile-archive-dialog.course-participant: This user is an attendee in course(s):
profile-archive-dialog.course-participant-action: To archive this user, their attendance needs to be cancelled from these courses.

profile-delete-dialog.title: Delete Confirmation
profile-delete-dialog.confirmation-title: Are you sure you want to delete user "{{firstName}} {{lastName}}" with the email "{{email}}"?
profile-delete-dialog.confirmation-message: Deleting a user will remove them completely from Connect and this action cannot be undone. The user will need to re-register an account to gain to access to Connect.
profile-delete-dialog.confirmation-warning: Please confirm that you wish to proceed with this action.

error.message: User "{{firstName}} {{lastName}}" with the email "{{email}}" cannot be deleted due to the following reason(s):
error.delete-error: An error occurred while deleting the user.
error.no-delete-trainer: This user is a trainer for course(s): {{courseIds}}.
error.no-delete-certified: Can not delete user with a certificate.

request-a-quote.more-info: Find out about the advantages of running a course in your own organisation. Contact us on <0>{{email}}</0> or request a quote using the button below.
